document.full_text: an animal rights group bought michael vick's former dogfighting compound in norfolk, va., and plans to turn it into a rehabilitation center for chained and penned dogs.
document.title: sports briefing | pro football: vick's compound bought by animal rights group
lines_and_colors: an animal rights group bought michael vick's former dogfighting compound in norfolk, va., and plans to turn it into a rehabilitation center for chained and penned dogs.
